Text: Natural Gas Roundtable Luncheon Tuesday November Dear Invitees Mitch Daniels Director of OMB will be our guest speaker for the Tuesday November luncheon Mr Daniels will discuss the Administrations overall budget priorities as well as tax and funding issues related to energy Details are attached For reservations please email or call me at by noon Friday November You do not need to be a member of the Roundtable to attend See you there Sue Swann Coordinator

Natural Gas Roundtable Luncheon Thursday July Invitees We are happy to tell you that Frank Blake Deputy Secretary DOE will be our guest speaker for the Thursday July luncheon at the University Club More detailed information is attached You do not need to be a member of the Roundtable to attend Please email or call me at by noon Tuesday July to make your reservation See you on the th Sue Julydoc

June Natural Gas Roundtable Lunchofficers of the Natural Gas Roundtable would like to invite you to attend a NGR luncheon on Thursday June We are very pleased that Rep J C Watts Jr has agreed to be the guest speaker for this lunch and he will discuss national energy energy security and price stability You do not need to be a member of the Roundtable to attend Attached is a notice with more details regarding this luncheon If you would like to attend please RSVP to me by noon on Tuesday June Hope to see you Thursday Sue Swann Coordinator NGR Junedoc

Nora Mead Brownell Feb Natural Gas Roundtable SpeakerWe are very excited to have FERC Commissioner Nora Mead Brownell as our guest speaker for the Feb Natural Gas Roundtable lunch More detailed information is attached To make your reservation please email or call me by noon Feb Just a reminder that you do not need to be a member of the Roundtable to attend Also attached is the dues notice in the event you would like to join us this year Look forward to seeing you on the st Sue
